With the steep learning curve for such a simplistic arena shooter - it was frustrating 50 hours on casual. I've dipped my toes in competitive and have been called a variety of names already so COMP is not for the faint of heart. But I kind like it for some reason. The fast paced strategy is addicting, and unlocking gun skins is probably the most disgusting game system I have spent money on.. but hey - I love getting gun skins. The marketing for skins is ridiculous - it baffles me that it exists..but I find the raffle system addicting. MAN it EATS my wallet more than it should. I purchased the game full price so I just wish players could unlock containers by winning games - instead of unloading your bank account.
